articles.description: In South Africa, a coronavirus ban on cigarettes and alcohol has sparked an illegal business. CNN's David McKenzie speaks with soldiers trying to enforce the ban and with a Zimbabwean cigarette smuggler, who says his "profits are up."
articles.content: Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.
